## 1

(a)

GI VC:M | F:M denotes the ratio of mean ratios between "very conservative" and "moderate" ideology comparing "female" to "male". 

GI M:VL | F:M measures the ratio of mean ratios between "moderate" and "very liberal" ideology comparing "female" to "male".
